title: Stars of graphs of projective codes
abstract:
Let $\Gamma_k(V)$ be the Grassmann graph whose vertex set is formed by all
$k$-dimensional subspaces of an $n$-dimensional vector space $V$ over the
finite field $F_q$ consisting of $q$ elements. We discuss its subgraph
$\Pi(n,k)_q$ formed by projective codes. We show that there are precisely two
types of maximal cliques in $\Pi(n,k)_q$: stars and tops. We give a complete
description of stars, i.e., maximal cliques consisting of all $k$-dimensional
projective codes containing a certain $(k-1)$-dimensional subspace of $V$.
